query.name: GET_CONTA_RUOLI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM PEOPLEGROUPS WHERE PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ @param2@

query.name: GET_EX_RUOLI
query.value: select var_codice||' - '||var_desc_corr as res from dpa_corr_globali c, peoplegroups p where p.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ and p.DTA_FINE is not null and c.ID_GRUPPO = p.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID

query.name: GET_RUOLIUTENTE_E_ALTRIUTENTI
query.value: SELECT A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID AS IDGRUPPO, CG.SYSTEM_ID AS IDCORRGRUPPO, G.GROUP_NAME AS GRUPPO, (SELECT COUNT(b.people_system_id) FROM PEOPLEGROUPS b WHERE b.groups_system_id = a.groups_system_id AND b.dta_fine IS NULL AND b.people_system_id NOT IN (@param1@)) AS ALTRIUTENTI FROM PEOPLEGROUPS A, GROUPS G, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG WHERE A.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = G.SYSTEM_ID AND CG.ID_GRUPPO = G.SYSTEM_ID AND A.DTA_FINE is null

query.name: GET_CONTA_LOG
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_LOG WHERE ID_AMM = @param1@

query.name: GET_ID_UO_PARENT
query.value: select id_uo from DPA_CORR_GLOBALI where system_id = @param1@

query.name: GET_IDTIPORUOLO_BY_IDCORR
query.value: select id_tipo_ruolo from DPA_CORR_GLOBALI where system_id = @param1@

query.name: GET_COD_TIPO_RUOLO_BY_ID
query.value: select var_codice from DPA_TIPO_RUOLO where system_id = @param1@

query.name: GET_DESC_TIPO_RUOLO_BY_ID
query.value: select var_desc_ruolo from DPA_TIPO_RUOLO where system_id = @param1@

query.name: CHECK_TRASMISSIONI_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR.id_mitt_dest = DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.ID_PEOPLE=@param1@

query.name: CHECK_TODOLIST_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(C.SYSTEM_ID) AS TOT FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND ((B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND C.ID_PEOPLE = @param2@) OR B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@) AND (A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' OR A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'F') AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND C.CHA_ACCETTATA='0' AND C.CHA_RIFIUTATA = '0' AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1') OR ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N' OR D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'I') AND C.CHA_VISTA = '0'))

query.name: CHECK_TODOLIST_UTENTE2
query.value: SELECT COUNT(C.SYSTEM_ID) AS TOT FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND C.ID_PEOPLE = @param1@ AND (A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' OR A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'F') AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND C.CHA_ACCETTATA='0' AND C.CHA_RIFIUTATA = '0' AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1') OR ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N' OR D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'I') AND C.CHA_VISTA = '0'))

query.name: CHECK_TODOLIST_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(B.SYSTEM_ID) AS TOT FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND (A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' OR A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'F') AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND C.CHA_ACCETTATA='0' AND C.CHA_RIFIUTATA = '0' AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1') OR ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N' OR D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'I') AND C.CHA_VISTA = '0'))

query.name: CHECK_TODOLIST_RUOLO2
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT B.SYSTEM_ID AS ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND (A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' OR A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'F') AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND C.CHA_ACCETTATA='0' AND C.CHA_RIFIUTATA = '0' AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1') OR ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N' OR D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'I') AND C.CHA_VISTA = '0')) AND C.ID_PEOPLE NOT IN (@param2@)

query.name: CHECK_ADL_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_AREA_LAVORO WHERE id_people = @param1@ AND (id_profile IS NOT NULL OR id_project IS NOT NULL)

query.name: CHECK_VISIBILITA_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT,THING FROM SECURITY WHERE THING IN (SELECT THING FROM SECURITY WHERE (PERSONORGROUP = @param1@)) AND (ACCESSRIGHTS > 0) GROUP BY THING ORDER BY TOT

query.name: GET_NETWORK_ALIASES
query.value: SELECT NETWORK_ID FROM NETWORK_ALIASES WHERE PERSONORGROUP=@param1@

query.name: GET_UTENTE_RIF
query.value: SELECT A.USER_ID AS CODICE FROM PEOPLE A, PEOPLEGROUPS B, GROUPS C WHERE B.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID AND B.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = A.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(C.GROUP_ID) = UPPER('@param1@') AND B.CHA_UTENTE_RIF = '1' AND B.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND A.ID_AMM = @param2@

query.name: GET_RUOLO_RIF
query.value: SELECT B.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG A, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE B.SYSTEM_ID=A.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO AND A.ID_REGISTRO=@param1@ AND A.CHA_RIFERIMENTO='1' AND B.ID_AMM=@param2@

query.name: GET_TIPO_ATTO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE UPPER(VAR_DESC_ATTO)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_TIPO_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DOCUMENTTYPES WHERE UPPER(TYPE_ID)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_USER_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(user_id)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_USER_BY_NAME_AND_ID_AMM
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(user_id)=UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM=@param2@

query.name: GET_ROLE_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM Groups WHERE UPPER(Group_Id)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_USER_ROLE
query.value: SELECT GROUP_ID FROM GROUPS, PEOPLEGROUPS, PEOPLE WHERE GROUPS.SYSTEM_ID = PEOPLEGROUPS.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID AND PEOPLE.SYSTEM_ID = PEOPLEGROUPS.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID AND PEOPLEGROUPS.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_REG_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE UPPER(var_codice)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_ADMIN_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE UPPER(var_codice_amm)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: SELECT_PEOPLEGROUPS
query.value: SELECT PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLEGROUPS WHERE GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: CHECK_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM SECURITY WHERE THING=@param1@ AND PERSONORGROUP=@param2@

query.name: GET_TIPO_FUNZIONE_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE WHERE UPPER(VAR_COD_TIPO)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM=@param2@

query.name: GET_CORR_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM DPA_Corr_Globali WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM=@param2@ @param3@

query.name: GET_DESC_CORR_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT var_desc_corr FROM DPA_Corr_Globali WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM=@param2@ @param3@

query.name: GET_DESC_CORR_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT var_desc_corr FROM DPA_Corr_Globali WHERE system_id = @param1@

query.name: GET_GROUP_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT a.SYSTEM_ID FROM GROUPS a, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI b WHERE a.GROUP_ID = b.VAR_CODICE AND a.GROUP_ID = '@param1@' AND b.ID_AMM = @param2@ AND b.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'R'

query.name: GET_DPA_FUNZIONI_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM DPA_Funzioni WHERE UPPER(COD_FUNZIONE)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: GET_LASTKEY
query.value: SELECT LASTKEY FROM DOCS_UNIQUE_KEYS WHERE TBNAME='SYSTEMKEY'

query.name: GET_NODO_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM Project WHERE cha_tipo_proj IN ('T', 'F', 'C')

query.name: GET_DPA_CORR_GRUPPO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT id_gruppo FROM DPA_Corr_Globali WHERE cha_tipo_urp='R'

query.name: GET_UO_PARENT
query.value: SELECT Id_Parent FROM DPA_Corr_Globali WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE System_Id=@param1@

query.name: GET_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT PERSONORGROUP FROM SECURITY WHERE THING=@param1@

query.name: CHECK_UNIQUE_CODE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM @param1@ WHERE @param2@='@param3@' @param4@

query.name: CHECK_COUNT_CONDITION
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM @param1@ WHERE @param2@

query.name: GET_SEGNATURA_FASCICOLATURA
query.value: SELECT VAR_FORMATO_SEGNATURA, VAR_FORMATO_FASCICOLATURA FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: CHECK_ADMIN_LOGIN
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param1@') AND USER_PASSWORD='@param2@' AND CHA_AMMINISTRATORE='1' AND DISABLED='N'

query.name: GET_ADMIN_LOGIN
query.value: SELECT VAR_SEMAFORO FROM DPA_LOCK WHERE VAR_SEMAFORO LIKE 'AMMINISTRAZIONE/%'

query.name: CHECK_UNIQUE_ADMIN
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_LOCK WHERE VAR_SEMAFORO @param1@

query.name: GET_ID_FASC_GEN
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_PARENT=@param1@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ='F' AND CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO='G'

query.name: GET_FASC_FOLDER
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ='C'

query.name: INSERT_NETWORK_ALIASES
query.value: INSERT INTO NETWORK_ALIASES (@param1@ PERSONORGROUP,NETWORK_TYPE,NETWORK_ID) VALUES (@param2@ @param3@,8,'@param4@')

query.name: INSERT_UNIQUE_ADMIN
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_LOCK (VAR_SEMAFORO,NUM_STATO) VALUES('@param1@',@param2@)

query.name: INSERT_SECURITY
query.value: INSERT INTO Security (THING, PERSONORGROUP, ACCESSRIGHTS, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO) VALUES (@param1@, @param2@, 255, 'P')

query.name: NEW_AMMINISTRAZIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_Amministra (@param1@ VAR_CODICE_AMM, VAR_DESC_AMM, VAR_LIBRERIA, VAR_FORMATO_SEGNATURA, VAR_FORMATO_FASCICOLATURA, VAR_DOMINIO,VAR_SMTP,NUM_PORTA_SMTP,VAR_RAGIONE_TO,VAR_RAGIONE_CC,VAR_USER_SMTP,VAR_PWD_SMTP) VALUES (@param2@'@param3@', '@param4@', '@param5@', '@param6@', '@param7@', '@param8@','@param9@',@param10@, '@param12@','@param13@','@param14@','@param15@')

query.name: NEW_REGISTRO
NEW_SERVER_POSTA
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_SERVER_POSTA (@param1@ VAR_CODICE,VAR_SERVER_POP,NUM_PORTA_POP,VAR_SERVER_SMTP,NUM_PORTA_SMTP,VAR_DOMINIO,VAR_DESCRIZIONE) VALUES (@param2@ '@param3@', '@param4@', '@param5@', '@param6@', '@param7@', '@param8@', '@param9@')

query.name: NEW_REGISTRO_PROTO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_REG_PROTO (@param1@ NUM_RIF, ID_REGISTRO) VALUES (@param2@ @param3@, @param4@)

query.name: NEW_UTENTE_RUOLO
query.value: INSERT INTO PEOPLEGROUPS (GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID, PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID @param3@) VALUES (@param1@, @param2@ @param4@)

query.name: NEW_RUOLO_REGISTRO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_L_RUOLO_REG (@param1@ ID_REGISTRO, ID_RUOLO_IN_UO) VALUES (@param2@ @param3@, @param4@)

query.name: NEW_TIPO_FUNZIONE_RUOLO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO (@param1@ ID_TIPO_FUNZ, ID_RUOLO_IN_UO) VALUES (@param2@ @param3@, @param4@)

query.name: NEW_TIPO_RUOLO
NEW_DPA_CORR_UO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_Corr_Globali ( @param1@ ID_AMM, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR, ID_PARENT, NUM_LIVELLO, VAR_CODICE, CHA_TIPO_IE, CHA_TIPO_URP, CHA_TIPO_CORR, ID_OLD, CHA_PA, VAR_CODICE_AOO, VAR_CODICE_AMM, VAR_EMAIL, DTA_INIZIO, InteropRegistryId, InteropRfId ) VALUES ( @param2@ @param3@, '@param4@', '@param5@', @param6@, @param7@, '@param8@', 'I', 'U', 'S', 0, '@param9@', '@param10@', @param11@, @param12@, @param13@, @param14@, @param15@ )

query.name: NEW_GROUP
query.value: INSERT INTO Groups (@param1@ GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, DISABLED, ALLOW_LOGIN) VALUES (@param2@ '@param3@', '@param4@', 'N', 'Y')

query.name: NEW_DPA_CORR_RUOLO
NEW_PEOPLE
query.value: INSERT INTO People (@param1@ USER_ID, FULL_NAME, DISABLED, USER_PASSWORD, ALLOW_LOGIN, TARGET_DOCSRVR, PRIMARY_GROUP, PRIMARY_LIB, ID_AMM, VAR_COGNOME, VAR_NOME, CHA_AMMINISTRATORE, CHA_NOTIFICA, EMAIL_ADDRESS, VAR_SEDE, CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO, FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS, LDAP_NEVER_SYNC, LDAP_ID_SYNC, ID_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR, IS_ENABLED_SMART_CLIENT, SMART_CLIENT_PDF_CONV_ON_SCAN, LDAP_AUTHENTICATED, ID_DISPOSITIVO_STAMPA, ABILITATO_CENTRO_SERVIZI, MATRICOLA, CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI, ABILITATO_ESIBIZIONE ) VALUES (@param2@ '@param3@', '@param4@', '@param11@', '@param5@', 'Y', 0, 0, 0, @param6@, '@param7@', '@param8@', '@param9@', '@param12@', '@param10@', '@param13@', '@param14@', '@param15@', '@param16@', '@param17@', @param18@, '@param19@', '@param20@', '@param21@', @param22@, '@param23@', '@param24@', '@param25@', '@param26@' )

query.name: NEW_DPA_CORR_UTENTE
NEW_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_Tipo_Funzione (@param1@ VAR_COD_TIPO, VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN, CHA_VIS) VALUES (@param2@ '@param3@', '@param4@', 1)

query.name: NEW_DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_Ragione_Trasm (@param1@ VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE, CHA_VIS, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI, CHA_TIPO_DEST, CHA_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTE, CHA_EREDITA, CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA, ID_AMM, VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM) VALUES ( @param2@ '@param3@', '@param4@', '@param5@', '@param6@', '@param7@', '@param8@', '@param9@', '@param10@', '@param11@', @param12@, @param13@)

query.name: NEW_DPA_FUNZIONI
UPDATE_UTENTE_DTA_FINE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET DTA_FINE=@param1@ WHERE ID_PEOPLE=@param2@

query.name: UPDATE_UTENTE_RIF
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLEGROUPS SET CHA_UTENTE_RIF='@param1@' WHERE @param2@ @param3@

query.name: REMOVE_UTENTE_RIF
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLEGROUPS SET CHA_UTENTE_RIF='' WHERE CHA_UTENTE_RIF='1' AND PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT ID_PEOPLE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@)

query.name: UPDATE_RUOLO_RIF
query.value: UPDATE DPA_L_RUOLO_REG SET CHA_RIFERIMENTO='@param1@' WHERE ID_REGISTRO=@param2@ @param3@

query.name: UPDATE_ORDERING
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET VAR_COD_LIV1='@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID='@param1@'

query.name: UPDATE_ADMIN_PWD
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLE SET USER_PASSWORD='@param1@' WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)='@param2@'

query.name: UPDATE_AMMINISTRAZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_Amministra SET VAR_DESC_AMM='@param1@', VAR_LIBRERIA='@param2@', VAR_FORMATO_SEGNATURA='@param3@', VAR_FORMATO_FASCICOLATURA='@param4@',VAR_DOMINIO='@param5@', VAR_SMTP='@param7@',NUM_PORTA_SMTP=@param8@, VAR_RAGIONE_TO='@param10@',VAR_RAGIONE_CC='@param11@', VAR_USER_SMTP='@param12@',VAR_PWD_SMTP='@param13@' WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE_AMM)=UPPER('@param6@')

query.name: UPDATE_REGISTRO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_EL_Registri SET VAR_DESC_REGISTRO='@param1@', VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO='@param2@', VAR_USER_MAIL='@param3@', VAR_PWD_MAIL='@param4@', VAR_SERVER_SMTP='@param5@', NUM_PORTA_SMTP=@param6@, VAR_SERVER_POP='@param7@', NUM_PORTA_POP=@param8@, CHA_AUTOMATICO='@param11@', VAR_USER_SMTP='@param12@', VAR_PWD_SMTP='@param13@' WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param9@') AND ID_AMM=@param10@

query.name: UPDATE_SERVER_POSTA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_SERVER_POSTA SET VAR_SERVER_POP='@param1@',NUM_PORTA_POP='@param2@', VAR_SERVER_SMTP='@param3@',NUM_PORTA_SMTP='@param4@',VAR_DOMINIO='@param5@', VAR_DESCRIZIONE='@param6@' WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param7@')

query.name: UPDATE_GROUPS_SPOSTA_RUOLO
query.value: UPDATE GROUPS SET GROUP_ID = '@param1@', GROUP_NAME = '@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: UPDATE_CORR_GLOB_SPOSTA_RUOLO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET VAR_CODICE = '@param1@', VAR_COD_RUBRICA = '@param1@', VAR_DESC_CORR = '@param2@', ID_UO = @param3@, CHA_RIFERIMENTO = '' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param4@

query.name: UPDATE_TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_Tipo_Ruolo SET NUM_LIVELLO=@param1@, VAR_DESC_RUOLO='@param2@' WHERE ID_AMM=@param3@ AND UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param4@')

query.name: UPDATE_DPA_CORR_UO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_Corr_Globali SET VAR_DESC_CORR='@param1@', VAR_COD_RUBRICA='@param2@', CHA_PA='@param5@', VAR_CODICE_AOO='@param6@' WHERE ID_AMM=@param3@ AND UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param4@')

query.name: UPDATE_DPA_CORR_RUOLO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_Corr_Globali SET VAR_DESC_CORR='@param1@', VAR_COD_RUBRICA='@param2@', CHA_RIFERIMENTO='@param3@' WHERE ID_AMM=@param4@ AND UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param5@') AND CHA_TIPO_URP='R'

query.name: UPDATE_PEOPLE
query.value: UPDATE People SET FULL_NAME='@param1@', USER_PASSWORD='@param2@', VAR_COGNOME='@param3@', VAR_NOME='@param4@', CHA_AMMINISTRATORE='@param7@', EMAIL_ADDRESS='@param8@', CHA_NOTIFICA='@param9@', VAR_SEDE='@param10@', CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO='@param11@' WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param5@') AND ID_AMM=@param6@

query.name: DISABLE_PEOPLE
query.value: UPDATE People SET DISABLED='Y' WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM=@param2@

query.name: DISABLE_PEOPLE_BY_ID
query.value: UPDATE People SET DISABLED='Y' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: ENABLE_PEOPLE
query.value: UPDATE People SET DISABLED='N' WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM=@param2@

query.name: UPDATE_DPA_CORR_UTENTE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_Corr_Globali SET VAR_COD_RUBRICA='@param1@', VAR_DESC_CORR='@param2@', VAR_COGNOME='@param3@', VAR_NOME='@param4@', VAR_EMAIL='@param8@' @param5@ WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param6@') AND ID_AMM=@param7@ AND CHA_TIPO_URP='P'

query.name: UPDATE_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: UPDATE DPA_Corr_Globali SET CHA_DETTAGLI='@param1@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param2@

query.name: UPDATE_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_Tipo_Funzione SET VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN='@param1@' WHERE UPPER(VAR_COD_TIPO)=UPPER('@param2@')

query.name: UPDATE_DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM
query.value: UPDATE DPA_Ragione_Trasm SET CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE='@param1@', CHA_VIS='@param2@', CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI='@param3@', CHA_TIPO_DEST='@param4@', CHA_RISPOSTA='@param5@', VAR_NOTE='@param6@', CHA_EREDITA='@param7@', CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA='@param8@', VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM=@param11@ WHERE VAR_DESC_RAGIONE='@param9@' AND ID_AMM=@param10@

query.name: UPDATE_LASTKEY
query.value: UPDATE DOCS_UNIQUE_KEYS SET LASTKEY=(LASTKEY+1) WHERE TBNAME='SYSTEMKEY'

query.name: REMOVE_CHA_PREFERITO_UTENTE
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLEGROUPS SET CHA_PREFERITO = NULL WHERE PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: SET_CHA_PREFERITO_UTENTE
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLEGROUPS SET CHA_PREFERITO = '1' WHERE PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID=@param1@ AND GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID=@param2@

query.name: DELETE_NETWORK_ALIASES
query.value: DELETE FROM NETWORK_ALIASES WHERE PERSONORGROUP=@param1@

query.name: DELETE_UNIQUE_ADMIN
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LOCK WHERE VAR_SEMAFORO LIKE 'AMMINISTRAZIONE%'

query.name: DELETE_TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_Tipo_Ruolo WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@ AND UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param2@')

query.name: DELETE_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_Tipo_Funzione WHERE UPPER(VAR_COD_TIPO)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: DELETE_SERVER_POSTA
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_SERVER_POSTA WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: DELETE_RUOLO_REGISTRO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE ID_RUOLO_IN_UO=@param1@

query.name: DELETE_TIPO_FUNZIONE_RUOLO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO WHERE ID_RUOLO_IN_UO=@param1@

query.name: DELETE_DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_Ragione_Trasm WHERE VAR_DESC_RAGIONE='@param1@' AND ID_AMM=@param2@

query.name: DELETE_DPA_FUNZIONI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_Funzioni WHERE ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE=@param1@

query.name: DELETE_SECURITY
query.value: DELETE FROM Security WHERE thing=@param1@

query.name: DELETE_NODI_TITOLARIO
query.value: DELETE FROM Project WHERE cha_tipo_proj IN ('T', 'F', 'C')

query.name: DELETE_PEOPLE
query.value: DELETE FROM People WHERE NOT (var_nome IS NULL) OR NOT (var_cognome IS NULL)

query.name: DELETE_SINGLE_PEOPLE
query.value: DELETE FROM People WHERE @param1@

query.name: DELETE_DPA_CORR
query.value: DELETE FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE cha_tipo_urp='@param1@'

query.name: DELETE_DPA_CORR_SINGOLO
query.value: DELETE FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM=@param2@

query.name: DELETE_PEOPLEGROUPS
query.value: DELETE FROM PeopleGroups WHERE groups_system_id=@param1@

query.name: DELETE_PEOPLEGROUPS_FROM_IDPEOPLE_IDRUOLO
query.value: DELETE FROM PeopleGroups WHERE people_system_id = @param1@ AND groups_system_id = @param2@

query.name: DELETE_PEOPLEGROUPS_FROM_IDPEOPLE
query.value: DELETE FROM PeopleGroups WHERE people_system_id = @param1@

query.name: DELETE_GROUPS
query.value: DELETE FROM Groups WHERE system_id=@param1@

query.name: DELETE_GROUPS_BY_NAME
query.value: DELETE FROM Groups WHERE UPPER(group_id)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: DELETE_TABLE
query.value: DELETE FROM @param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_ADMIN_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_AMMINISTRAZIONI
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA

query.name: EXP_GET_FUNZIONI_BY_TIPO
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_FUNZIONI WHERE ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_UTENTI_RUOLO_UO
query.value: SELECT USER_ID, CHA_PREFERITO FROM GROUPS G, PEOPLEGROUPS PG, PEOPLE P WHERE PG.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = G.SYSTEM_ID AND PG.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = P.SYSTEM_ID AND UPPER(G.GROUP_ID) = UPPER('@param1@') --AND PG.DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: EXP_GET_FUNZIONI_RUOLO_UO
query.value: SELECT TR.VAR_COD_TIPO AS CODICE FROM DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO TF,DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE TR WHERE TR.SYSTEM_ID=TF.ID_TIPO_FUNZ AND TF.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_NODI_TITOLARIO_AMM
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID,CHA_TIPO_PROJ,ID_PARENT,ID_FASCICOLO,DESCRIPTION,ID_REGISTRO,VAR_CODICE FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@ AND ID_PARENT=@param2@ @param3@ ORDER BY VAR_COD_LIV1

query.name: EXP_GET_NODI_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT system_id, var_codice, description, id_parent, num_livello FROM PROJECT WHERE cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND id_amm = @param1@ ORDER BY var_cod_liv1

query.name: EXP_GET_RAGIONE_TRASM
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_RAGIONE_TRASM_NULL
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE ID_AMM IS NULL

query.name: EXP_GET_REGISTRI_BY_AMM
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_REGISTRO_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_REGISTRI_RUOLO_UO
query.value: SELECT R.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG RR,DPA_EL_REGISTRI R WHERE R.SYSTEM_ID=RR.ID_REGISTRO AND RR.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_RUOLI_BY_AMM
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@ ORDER BY NUM_LIVELLO ASC

query.name: EXP_GET_RUOLI_UO_BY_AMM
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID AS ID,A.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE,B.VAR_CODICE AS CODICESTRUTTURA, A.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE,A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS RUBRICA,A.CHA_RIFERIMENTO AS RIFERIMENTO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A,DPA_TIPO_RUOLO B WHERE B.SYSTEM_ID=A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO AND CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND A.ID_AMM=@param1@ AND ID_UO=@param2@

query.name: EXP_GET_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE

query.name: EXP_GET_FUNZIONI_ELEMENTARI
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_FUNZIONI WHERE (CHA_TIPO_FUNZ NOT IN ('E') OR CHA_TIPO_FUNZ IS NULL) AND DISABLED = 'N'

query.name: EXP_GET_UO_BY_AMM
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP='U' AND ID_AMM=@param1@ AND ID_PARENT=@param2@ AND CHA_TIPO_IE='I'

query.name: EXP_GET_UTENTI_BY_AMM
query.value: SELECT a.USER_ID,a.USER_PASSWORD,a.VAR_NOME,a.VAR_COGNOME,b.VAR_COD_RUBRICA,b.VAR_EMAIL,a.CHA_AMMINISTRATORE,a.SYSTEM_ID,a.DISABLED,a.CHA_NOTIFICA,a.VAR_SEDE,a.CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO FROM PEOPLE a,DPA_CORR_GLOBALI b WHERE b.ID_PEOPLE = a.SYSTEM_ID AND a.ID_AMM = @param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_CORRISPONDENTI
query.value: SELECT DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.SYSTEM_ID AS ID,* FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI LEFT OUTER JOIN DPA_DETT_GLOBALI ON DPA_DETT_GLOBALI.ID_CORR_GLOBALI=DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.SYSTEM_ID WHERE ID_AMM=@param1@ AND (CHA_TIPO_URP='P' OR CHA_TIPO_CORR='O')

query.name: EXP_GET_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER>@param1@ ORDER BY DOCNUMBER

query.name: EXP_GET_OGGETTO
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_OGGETTARIO WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_CORRISPONDENTI_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR WHERE ID_PROFILE=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_CODICE_CORRISPONDENTE
query.value: SELECT VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_CODICE_PEOPLE
query.value: SELECT USER_ID FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_CODICE_RUOLO_UO
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_PAROLE_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT VAR_DESC_PAROLA FROM DPA_PAROLE,DPA_PROF_PAROLE WHERE DPA_PROF_PAROLE.ID_PROFILE=@param1@ AND DPA_PAROLE.SYSTEM_ID=DPA_PROF_PAROLE.ID_PAROLA

query.name: EXP_GET_VERSIONI_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT * FROM VERSIONS,COMPONENTS WHERE COMPONENTS.VERSION_ID=VERSIONS.VERSION_ID AND VERSIONS.DOCNUMBER=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_TRASMISSIONI_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE WHERE ID_PROFILE=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_TRASMISSIONI_SINGOLE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA WHERE ID_TRASMISSIONE=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_TRASMISSIONI_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE ID_TRASM_SINGOLA=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_DESC_RAGIONE_TRASM
query.value: SELECT VAR_DESC_RAGIONE FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_VISIBILITA_DOC_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT * FROM SECURITY,PEOPLE WHERE PEOPLE.SYSTEM_ID=SECURITY.PERSONORGROUP AND THING=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_VISIBILITA_DOC_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT GROUP_ID FROM SECURITY,GROUPS WHERE GROUPS.SYSTEM_ID=SECURITY.PERSONORGROUP AND THING=@param1@

query.name: EXP_GET_VISIBILITA_DOC_RUOLO_REG
query.value: SELECT s.THING, g.GROUP_ID, r.var_codice, a.var_codice_amm FROM PROJECT p, SECURITY s, GROUPS g, DPA_EL_REGISTRI r, DPA_AMMINISTRA a WHERE p.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND p.id_amm = a.system_id AND p.id_registro = r.system_id AND p.system_id = s.THING AND g.SYSTEM_ID = s.PERSONORGROUP

query.name: EXP_GET_SERVER_POSTA
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_SERVER_POSTA

query.name: IMP_NEW_CORRISPONDENTE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CORR_GLOBALI ( @param1@ ID_REGISTRO, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR, DTA_INIZIO, DTA_FINE, VAR_CODICE, VAR_COGNOME, VAR_NOME, CHA_TIPO_CORR, CHA_TIPO_IE, VAR_CODICE_AOO, CHA_PA, VAR_EMAIL, VAR_SMTP, NUM_PORTA_SMTP, ID_AMM, CHA_TIPO_URP, NUM_LIVELLO, ID_PARENT ) VALUES ( @param2@ @param3@, '@param4@', '@param5@', @param6@, @param7@, '@param8@', '@param9@', '@param10@', '@param11@', '@param12@', '@param13@', '@param14@', '@param15@', '@param16@', @param17@, @param18@, '@param19@', @param20@, @param21@ )

query.name: IMP_NEW_CORR_DETTAGLI
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_DETT_GLOBALI (@param1@ ID_CORR_GLOBALI,VAR_INDIRIZZO,VAR_CITTA,VAR_CAP,VAR_PROVINCIA, VAR_NAZIONE,VAR_COD_FISCALE,VAR_TELEFONO,VAR_TELEFONO2,VAR_FAX,VAR_NOTE) VALUES (@param2@ @param3@,'@param4@','@param5@','@param6@','@param7@','@param8@','@param9@','@param10@','@param11@', '@param12@','@param13@')

query.name: IMP_GET_CORR_BY_CODE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE @param1@ = @param2@

query.name: IMP_NEW_TIPODOCUMENTO
query.value: INSERT INTO DOCUMENTTYPES (@param1@ TYPE_ID,DESCRIPTION,CHA_TIPO_CANALE) VALUES (@param2@ '@param3@','@param4@','@param5@')

query.name: IMP_NEW_TIPOATTO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_TIPO_ATTO (@param1@ VAR_DESC_ATTO) VALUES (@param2@ '@param3@')

query.name: IMP_NEW_DOCUMENTO
query.value: INSERT INTO PROFILE (@param1@ DOCNUMBER, CHA_TIPO_PROTO, CHA_IMG, CHA_INVIO_CONFERMA, CHA_CONGELATO, CHA_CONSOLIDATO, CHA_PRIVATO, CHA_ASSEGNATO, CHA_FASCICOLATO, DOCUMENTTYPE, ID_TIPO_ATTO, CREATION_DATE, ID_OGGETTO, VAR_NOTE , CHA_DA_PROTO @param17@ ) VALUES ( @param2@ '@param3@', '@param4@', '@param5@', '@param6@', '@param7@', '@param8@', '@param9@', '@param10@', '@param11@', @param12@, @param13@, @param14@, @param15@, '@param16@', '@param19@' @param18@ )

query.name: IMP_GET_ID_PEOPLE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: IMP_GET_ID_CORR_BY_COD_RUBRICA
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE UPPER(VAR_COD_RUBRICA)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: IMP_GET_ID_PEOPLE_BY_COD_RUBRICA
query.value: SELECT ID_PEOPLE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE VAR_COD_RUBRICA='@param1@'

query.name: IMP_GET_ID_GROUP_BY_COD_RUBRICA
query.value: SELECT ID_GRUPPO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE VAR_COD_RUBRICA='@param1@'

query.name: IMP_GET_PEOPLE_IN_GROUP
query.value: SELECT PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLEGROUPS WHERE GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID=@param1@ AND DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: IMP_NEW_OGGETTO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_OGGETTARIO (@param1@ ID_REGISTRO,ID_AMM,VAR_DESC_OGGETTO,CHA_OCCASIONALE) VALUES (@param2@ @param3@,@param4@,'@param5@','@param6@')

query.name: IMP_GET_OGGETTO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_OGGETTARIO WHERE VAR_DESC_OGGETTO='@param1@' ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: IMP_GET_ID_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER='@param1@'

query.name: IMP_NEW_CORRISPONDENTE_DOC
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR (@param1@ ID_MITT_DEST,ID_PROFILE,CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST) VALUES (@param2@ @param3@,@param4@,'@param5@')

query.name: IMP_NEW_VERSIONE
IMP_GET_VERSIONE
query.value: SELECT VERSION_ID FROM VERSIONS WHERE DOCNUMBER=@param1@ AND VERSION='@param2@' AND SUBVERSION @param3@ ORDER BY VERSION_ID DESC

query.name: IMP_NEW_COMPONENT
IMP_NEW_FASCICOLO_DOC
GET_RUOLI_LIVELLO_SUPERIORE
query.value: SELECT id_parent FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE system_id = @param1@ AND cha_tipo_urp = 'R'

query.name: IMP_NEW_SICUREZZA
query.value: INSERT INTO SECURITY ( THING, PERSONORGROUP, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, ACCESSRIGHTS ) VALUES ( '@param1@', @param2@, '@param3@', 255 )

query.name: IMP_NEW_TRASMISSIONE
IMP_NEW_TRASMISSIONESINGOLA
IMP_NEW_TRASMISSIONEUTENTE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_TRASM_UTENTE ( @param1@ ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_PEOPLE, DTA_VISTA, DTA_ACCETTATA, DTA_RIFIUTATA, DTA_RISPOSTA, CHA_VISTA, CHA_ACCETTATA, CHA_RIFIUTATA, VAR_NOTE_ACC, VAR_NOTE_RIF, CHA_VALIDA ) VALUES ( @param2@ @param3@, @param4@, '@param5@', '@param6@', '@param7@', '@param8@', '@param9@', '@param10@', '@param11@', '@param12@', '@param13@', '@param14@' )

query.name: IMP_GET_LAST_TRASMISSIONESINGOLA
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: IMP_GET_LAST_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: IMP_GET_RAGIONE_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE VAR_DESC_RAGIONE='@param1@'

query.name: GET_UTENTI_RUOLI
query.value: SELECT GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID AS GROUP_ID, PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID AS USER_ID FROM PEOPLEGROUPS, PEOPLE WHERE PEOPLE.SYSTEM_ID = PEOPLEGROUPS.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID AND PEOPLEGROUPS.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND PEOPLE.ID_AMM = @param1@

query.name: GET_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT USER_ID AS NAME, USER_PASSWORD AS PASSWORD FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: GET_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT GROUP_ID FROM GROUPS WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: IMP_GET_PROJECT_BY_CODE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE VAR_CODICE='@param1@' AND ID_AMM=@param2@ @param3@

query.name: IMP_GET_ROOT_FOLDER
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ AND ID_PARENT=@param1@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ='C'

query.name: COPY_VISIBILITA
query.value: INSERT INTO SECURITY(thing,personorgroup,accessrights,id_gruppo_trasm,cha_tipo_DIRITTO) SELECT @param1@,personorgroup,accessrights,id_gruppo_trasm,cha_tipo_DIRITTO FROM SECURITY WHERE thing=@param2@

query.name: GET_ID_DOCUMENTO
query.value: select system_id from profile where docnumber=@param1@

query.name: GET_ID_UTENTE
query.value: select system_id from people where UPPER(user_id)='@param1@'

query.name: GET_ID_RUOLO_IN_UO
query.value: select system_id from dpa_corr_globali where UPPER(var_cod_rubrica)='@param1@'

query.name: GET_ID_OGGETTO
query.value: select system_id from dpa_oggettario where UPPER(var_desc_oggetto)='@param1@'

query.name: SET_OGGETTO_STORICO
query.value: INSERT INTO dpa_oggetti_sto(@param1@ dta_modifica, id_profile, id_oggetto, id_people, id_ruolo_in_uo) VALUES(@param2@ @param3@, @param4@, @param5@, @param6@, @param7@)

query.name: INSERT_IN_DPA_OGGETTARIO
query.value: INSERT INTO dpa_oggettario(@param1@ id_registro,id_amm,var_desc_oggetto,cha_occasionale) VALUES(@param2@ @param3@, @param4@,@param5@)
